resources.string:
This module can be used to login to this site using Azure AD B2C accounts.

To make it work make new registration in Azure portal then goto Azure AD B2C service.
When asked specify the following Redirect URI:

  • Redirect URL: {0}
When registration is complete go to "Overview" to copy Application (client) ID and Directory (tenant) ID.
Client secret can be generated in "Certificates & secrets".
For more info please refer to official documentation.
Domain and Tenant can be found in Application Overview > Endpoints, Tenant is first part of URI in any B2C endpoints URLs.
Please configure the module in admin panel (can't define Client ID & Secret)
